title: 5 Kamala Harris controversies: Extramarital affair, pro-life raid and Knights of Columbus criticism | Politics News
description: Here are five controversies surrounding Sen. Kamala Harris, presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden's selection as his vice-presidential running mate for the 2020 campaign against President Donald Trump. These controversies include some of Harris' decisions as attorney general of California, her authorizing the raid of a pro-life activist's home, and her questioning of a judicial nominee's affiliation with the Knights of Columbus.
